content: उद्धृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Drawn up or out (water), extracted &c. {@--2@} Raised, elevated, lifted up, thrown up or upwards; निक्षेपणाय पदमुद्धृतमुद्वहंती <ls>Ku. 5. 85.</ls> {@--3@} Uprooted, eradicated; उद्धृतारिः <ls>R. 2. 30.</ls> {@--4@} Separated, set apart. {@--5@} Divided, partitioned. {@--6@} Selected. {@--7@} Dispersed, scattered. {@--8@} Holding, containing. {@--9@} Uncovered. {@--10@} Vomited, cast up.
